title: AMAZING MEDIEVAL SIEGE BATTLE - Medieval 2 Total War Gameplay
description:
Medieval 2 Total War Gameplay - We are back playing Medieval 2 total war.  This is a really great battle thats down to the wire!  It's a 2v2 at a northern castle.  Jackie commands Sicily, and I command England.  The Moors and Papal States are defending the castle.  Enjoy the Battle :D

Jackie's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/Jackiefishhhhhh 

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
